pageContext.claim: “So, Russia -- we have been speaking to Russia about that -- about a pact for nuclear -- so that they get rid of some, we get rid of some. We'd probably have to put China in there. But right now, we're number one, Russia is number two, and China is number three. But China is quite a bit down, in terms of nuclear. China is much lower. But we would certainly want to include China at some point.”
pageContext.analysis: Estimates suggest Russia has more nuclear weapons stockpiled than the U.S. They also suggest France has more nuclear weapons than China, which lags more than 6,000 weapons behind Russia.
